subject: Dear: beneficiary.
body:
Dear: beneficiary.
Official information from the management and authority of European Union, we are here by officially to inform you that is very long time your fund is here, but we just got an information that you have changed your next of king, please update us if you are the one who authorized to change your next of king.
Your urgent response is highly needed.
Mr. Joseph Philip
European Union Security
Monitoring Center.

subject: Re:   Dear: beneficiary.
body:
Hello Mr. Joseph Philip,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite surprising news! I wasn't aware that I had any funds with the European Union, let alone a next of kin associated with it.

Could you please provide more details about these funds? How did they come to be in my name? And who is the next of kin that has been mentioned?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: Dear: beneficiary.
body:
Attention: Robert

We acknowledge receipt of your email, we are deeply sorry that we reply you
late, with your due respect this questions you ask to us, the person you
are supposed to ask such questions is Mr. John Smith, the information have
given to us to transfer $8.5 million to you.

We discovered that this is overlong do payment luggage to deliver to you in
Russia so the bank decided to transfer your fund to your account.

But we are surprised the questions you are asking are you not the owner of
this fund? It is very important for us to know are you not aware that you
are the owner of the fund?

We are waiting for your response with understanding.
You can contact us through our WhatsApp: +1-386-287-0575

Our regards

 Joseph Philip
Director Foreign Affairs
Telephone/WhatsApp number: +1-386-287-0575

subject: Re: Dear: beneficiary.
body:
Hello Joseph Philip,

Thank you for your response. I must admit, I'm a bit confused about the situation. You mentioned a Mr. John Smith and some funds that are supposed to be transferred to me? That's quite surprising! 

Could you please provide more details about this? How did this come about and why was my name chosen for this transfer? Also, who is Mr. John Smith and what is his role in all of this?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert
